congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Ensuring Removal of Terminated Providers from Medicaid and CHIP Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 3716, to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require States to provide to the Secretary of Health and Human Services certain information with respect to provider terminations, by a yea-and-nay vote of 406 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 105.

congVote.result: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Under the previous order requiring 60 votes for the adoption of this amendment, the amendment is agreed to.
Three-fifths of the Senators duly chosen and sworn not having voted in the affirmative, the motion is rejected.
